name: Maze Cycle
description:
Maze Cycle is a procedurally generated maze game where time changes quickly. Equipped with only a flashlight,  navigate throughout the maze and explore its contents, but don't let the flashlight die. You can pick up extra batteries along the way, but make sure to only get them when needed. 

Enjoy!

Controls:

Move: WASD 

Sprint: Shift + WASD

Jump: Space Bar

Restart: P

Quit: K

Menu: esc + M
